channel.title: What it takes to be a cybercriminal?
channel.description:
First of all, I want to thank this community for existing. I am so glad I found this forum, and I can't wait to read what is in here!
I really wonder what it takes to be a cybercriminal? What knowledge should you have and what cyber crimes should you participate in, in order to identify as a cybercriminal?
Also what should I do in order not to be considered a script kiddy? I purchased countless guides on HF and telegram with intentions to make money with black hat hacking. "How to run a mining botnet" , "Click fraud for beginners" , just to name a few. Yet I never made a single cent. And when I ask what I am doing wrong, the most often answer I get is : "You are just a skid".
I am really interested in the topic of running a mining botnet, so if anyone could comment some guides or learning materials I would be really glad!
Thanks in advance, and stay safe!

item.title: What it takes to be a cybercriminal?
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic
item.source: What it takes to be a cybercriminal?
